import React from 'react' import { Formik, Form, Field } from "formik" import addEducation from '../../../services/faculty/basic-info/addEducation' class EducationForm extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state = { duplicateForms: [] } } clone(){ this.state.duplicateForms.push(
) this.setState({ }) } remove(){ this.state.duplicateForms.pop() this.setState({ }) } render(){ let EducationDetails = { institutionSchool: "", degreeCert: "", majorSpecialization: "", startDate: "", endDate: "", proof: "" } return( { console.log(values.proof) actions.setFieldValue({ field: "proof", value: document.getElementById("proof").files[0] }) await addEducation(values) }} > {({ values, errors, touched, isSubmitting }) => (

{this.state.duplicateForms}

)} ) } } export default EducationForm
